user_query: not the intro that comes out in Disney movies There's a special intro to celebrate Walt Disney's 100th anniversary There are a lot of things to enjoy before the movie But when it was first unveiled at the Cannes Film Festival, Elemental was so unresponsive that he received rotten tomatoes with a positive rating of less than 60% on Rotten Tomatoes, an American review site In addition, despite spending more than 250 billion won on production, it earned 35 billion won in the three days after its release, making it the "worst debut movie in Pixar's 28-year history." However, many experts predict that the reason for Elemental's box office failure is that "many people started watching movies at home rather than at the movie theater after COVID-19." In Korea, on June 24, 10 days after its release, many people regard it as the success of the Korean Pixar movie, ranking first in the box office and accumulating 1 million viewers. However, the fact that the story is the story of rich boy and poor girl, and that the leak problem, which should be the central story, is treated too lightly is considered as a disadvantage There are many critics who regret that the proportion of air and soil elements, not fire and water elements with the main characters, is too small However, Pixar's biggest strengths, CG and visual beauty, as well as its creativity based on elementary theory, are recognized as very good Every time an element steps on a mineral, the color changes, the water boils, etc., and
